snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry told the Syrian opposition that support for the group could be reduced if it decided not to attend the talks, Western officials said.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry tells Syrian opposition that support for the group could be reduced if it decides not to attend upcoming peace conference in Switzerland; rebel coalition had been concerned that its influence in Syria, which is already limited, would be undermined further if it participated in a drawn-out peace conference that did not lead to any results.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry told the Syrian opposition that support for the group could be reduced if it decided not to attend the talks, Western officials said.

headline.main: Kerry Urges Syrian Rebels to Go to Peace Meeting
headline.print_headline: Kerry Urges Syrian Rebels to Go to Peace Meeting
